message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product offers unparalleled benefits and capabilities that could potentially revolutionize your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its exceptional features and value, I am offering it to you for $1500000. I believe this price reflects not only the investment we've made in research and development but also the immense potential it holds for you. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success.

I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it could bring to me. I'm willing to make a serious investment, but I need to stay within my budget.
